archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Coordinate Customer Problem
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process coordinates all the actions necessary in order to guarantee that all tasks are finished at the appropriate time and in the appropriate sequence. It schedules, assigns and coordinates any recovery activities, and any repair and restoration activities delegated to other processes. It undertakes necessary tracking of the execution progress, modifies information in an existing Customer Problem Report based on assignments, and modifies the Customer Problem Report status.

properties.value: Not used for this process element
